Title: Fileupload AJAX
Description: As it sounds: a FileUpload control with AJAX behavior... and much more new functionalities
HomeWiki:
FileUploadAJAX is an ASP.NET custom control that is similar to the predefined FileUpload control but with a key difference: AJAX behavior.

And what does this means? This means that with the FileUploadAJAX we can upload files in an asynchronous way and without reloading the page... that's all!

Furthemore there are a lot of configuration options.

Please, visit the official site to learn how to use the control.

Message for developers
All contributions are welcome, specially fixing bugs, documenting, applying patches and suggesting new features.
